text: All women have a perception much more developed than men. So all women somehow, being repressed for so many millennia, they ended up by developing this sixth sense and contemplation and love. And this is something that we have a hard time to accept as part of our society.
author: Paulo Coelho

text: A little philosophy inclineth man's mind to atheism, but depth in philosophy bringeth men's minds about to religion.
author: Francis Bacon

text: It's not the men in my life that count, it's the life in my men.
author: Mae West

text: When Jesus comes back, these crazy, greedy, capitalistic men are gonna kill him again.
author: Mike Tyson

text: The majority of men meet with failure because of their lack of persistence in creating new plans to take the place of those which fail.
author: Napoleon Hill
